name: Multi Rating & Review Matrix System
author: FreelanceResources Dev Team

sections.description:
IMPORTANT UPGRADE INFO 1.0.4 to 1.0.5
Before upgrading from 1.0.4 to 1.0.5 please make sure to deactivate the plugin first. Installations from 1.0.4 may not have the required tables

This plugin allows your visitors to rate a product or a service based on a series of criteria. It can be used as a simple rating system, or a complex matrix review one of up to 10 different criteria. It can be used for websites such as hotels, hosting review websites, business review websites, services review websites, polling and other kinds of rating systems and much more. It is very lightweight and works with wordpress native functions and hooks.
It is fully responsive both the client and admin ends.It is fully localizable and we include the .pot file to make easy.
You can join/follow the discussion about the plugin on its home page at http://www.freelanceresources.net/forums/forum/plugins-and-softwares/review-matrix/
If you have any bug issues, please report them at http://www.freelanceresources.net/forums/forum/plugins-and-softwares/review-matrix/ because that’s where we intend to keep track of all the information related to the plugin

UPCOMING FEATURES

  • Shortcode Support
  • Cookie based voting/rating (Debatable though)
  • Full site activity
  • MultiSite support
sections.installation:
1. Upload the rating-review-matrix directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the /wp-admin/admin.php?page=rmatrix-options of your installation and create a matrix or a few
  4. Associate a matrix you create to a post, page or custom post-type and voila!

Translation

  1. French .mo if included by default. That means, the plugin is included by default for a site that supports it
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Launch of the public version.
  • Created the plugin’s component.

1.0.1

  • Include Admin CSS
  • Full translation Support

1.0.2

  • More localization strings

1.0.3

  • Fixed directory structure issue
  • Added option checking to force / or not the user to login before voting
    = 1.0.5=
    Fixed table creation in version 1.0.4

screenshots.caption: In the Wordpress admin area, create a matrix or delete some
Once the matrix is created, you can select which one to associate with the post. Be careful not to change matrices as it will mess the ratings/votes up
Display the matrix on the frontend of the post you selected it for. Simple!
Matrix can be out of 5 OR  out of 10
Fully Licalizable. French .mo file is included automatically
